channel.title: S3 Policy :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: STAGE 4: S3 PERMITS (POLICY) CloudFront needs a “permission” to pull files from your 2 closed buckets. In CloudFront > Origins tab. Select Origin Singapore > Edit > Copy policy. Open a new tab > S3 Console > Bucket sgutodolist-frontend-sg. Permissions tab > Bucket Policy > Edit > Paste > Save. Repeat with Bucket Virginia: Go back to CloudFront > Select Origin Virginia > Edit > Copy policy. Go to S3 sgutodolist-frontend-us > Permissions > Bucket Policy > Paste > Save.
